alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Laramie County; East Platte County; Goshen County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 6:38PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT SOUTHWESTERN GOSHEN...NORTHERN LARAMIE AND SOUTHERN PLATTE COUNTIES... At 637 PM MST...A snow squall was 9 miles south of Chugwater, or 30 miles south of Wheatland...moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Sudden and brief snowfall rates up to 1 inch per hour, strong winds in excess of 45 mph, and visibilities less than one quarter mile. SOURCE...Radar and Webcams. IMPACT...Dangerous, life threatening travel conditions. Locations impacted include... Chugwater, Whitaker, Slater, Meriden Rest Area and Gun Barrel. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 21 and 65. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Expect rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Motorists are urged to use extreme caution if traveling through these areas!

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Laramie County; East Platte County; Goshen County; South Laramie Range Foothills
